con:interface.name: System Data APIs
con:interface.con:description:
# SYS-REST-API API documentation for **System Data** related screens provided by CMiC
_Note: These APIs can only be accessed if already a customer of CMiC._

BpAkaName: maxLength: 50 type: string description: "This field is the ‘Otherwise known as’ field, and can be used for custom reporting if required. BpFax: maxLength: 20 type: string description: This is an unformatted field representing the fax number for the Business Partner.
